synopsis.text: Takumi, Yuuta, and Shinobu, once carefree art students and roommates, find their lives forever changed by the arrival of the prodigious artist Hagumi. As they navigate the trials of college, love, and the future, each must confront their own personal challenges. Yuuta, newly returned from a journey across Japan, grapples with his long-standing affection for Hagumi, who in turn struggles to decipher the enigmatic Shinobu. Meanwhile, Takumi, now a working professional, strives to support his friends while juggling his own romantic dilemmas. As they forge ahead, these five young individuals must face heartache, confusion, and the inevitable choices that will shape their destinies.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
